page.title: 04Redpath,De Groot,Caledonian
page.content: R.G.C. is one of the leading offshore construction companies in Britain and it lies, on a site covering 135 acres, on the banks of the Firth of Forth at Denbeath, Methil.It constructs drilling and production jackets,decks and production modules,required by companies drilling for oil in the North Sea. It is owned by Trafalgar House P.L.C.(75%) and Howard Doris Ltd.(25%).R.G.C.has been in operation since 1972 and employs approximately 1,200 workers. The trades employed there incude welders,platers,caulker/burners,crane- drivers,erectors,scaffolders and electricians. Male unemployment in the district is 40% and this firm provides work for many of the local people in employment
